Package server.model

Interface GameManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
GameManagerImpl
public interface GameManager
it can be considered the model of the Scarabeo Server.

  • Method Details

    • createNewGame

      Game createNewGame()
      creates a new game and returns it
      Returns:
      the newly created game

    • addPlayer

      void addPlayer(Player player)
      add the given player to the list of the ones in game
      Parameters:
      player - the player to add to the list of the ones in game

    • removePlayer

      void removePlayer(Socket socket)
      removes the given player from the list of the ones in game
      Parameters:
      socket - the player to remove from the list of the ones in game

    • getUserGame

      Game getUserGame(Socket socket)
      Parameters:
      socket - the connection's socket to evaluate
      Returns:
      the game associated to a specif connection

    • getGame

      Optional<Game> getGame(int id)
      Parameters:
      id - the id to evaluate
      Returns:
      the game with the given id or an empty optional if there is no game with the given id

    • endGame

      void endGame(int lobbyId)
      end the game associated to the given lobbyId
      Parameters:
      lobbyId - the id of the lobby to end

    • cancelGame

      void cancelGame(int lobbyId)
      cancel the game associated to the given lobbyId
      Parameters:
      lobbyId - the id of the lobby to cancel
